name: Cynthia Baars RA
headline: Finance Professional at YellowFinance | CSRD professional
creator: False
bio:
YellowFinance ondersteunt ondernemingen bij het oplossen van complexe financiële (strategische) vraagstukken en verleent diensten waarbij het doel is om de financiële functie te verbeteren en verduurzamen.
Diensten en producten van YellowFinance zijn onder andere: CFO-as-a-service (CFO for a day), financiële quick scans, kostenbenchmarks en verbeteren stuurinformatie. Tevens helpen wij ondernemingen in het proces van een overname zowel aan de kopende als verkopende kant.

Waar staan wij voor? Mensgericht, ondernemend, creatief en verbindend.

Meer weten? https://www.yellowfinance.nl/

Dedicated team player.

name: Tommaso Vitti
headline: Commercialista e Revisore legale - Associato presso Guerrini Vitti Studio di Commercialisti
creator: False
bio: Nell’ambito della professione, svolgo principalmente l'attività di Curatore, liquidatore giudiziale, custode giudiziale, delegato alla vendita e curatore delle eredità giacenti al Tribunale di Livorno. Ho maturato vari anni di esperienza nell'ambito della consulenza preventiva e successiva della crisi d'impresa, dei piani di risanamento e del riassetto delle posizioni debitorie delle società oltreché delle procedure di sovraindebitamento delle persone fisiche. Ho svolto l'attività di advisor e di attestatore per la presentazione di strumenti regolatori della crisi quali proposte di concordato preventivo, concordato fallimentare e accordi di ristrutturazione dei debiti.

name: Kamho Lau
headline: Interim Financial/ Business controller
creator: False
bio:
PROFESSIONAL PROFILE
---------------------------------------------

 A driven finance professional with an extensive working experience in storage solutions of liquid energy and chemicals, retail, and entertainment business within a multinational environment. I am a dependable, performance-focused with a keen eye for detail. Key attributes include the ability to think pragmatically to overcome challenges, to strategize effectively, prioritise workloads and meet tight deadlines in a fast-paced and hard-working environment. Demonstrates an ongoing dedication to master new and emerging tools, and technologies creating business performance metrics/overviews to further enhance business results.

DATA & ANALYTICS SKILLS
---------------------------------------------

• Consolidation & Reporting tool: Oracle Hyperion Financial Management, Lucanet, Microsoft Business Central
• Proficient with MS Office Suite, especially Excel Microsoft Office Suite
• IBM Cognos TM1

name: Mathijs Matser
headline: Solution Architect at Salesforce Marketing Cloud
creator: False
bio:
From a young age, my interests extended to economics and numbers in particular. This passion led me to pursue education in the field and delve into various work experiences and extracurricular activities to deepen my understanding.

As a professional, I have had the privilege of working for leading companies across diverse industries, including FMCG, sports, advertising, and ad tech. Throughout my career, I have developed a strong affinity for data and marketing, leveraging this expertise to deliver impactful solutions for both B2B and B2C clients. In my current role at Salesforce, I specialize in consulting clients on how to maximize their martech capabilities, empowering them to achieve their business objectives.

Outside of my day-to-day job, I like to expand my horizons, which ultimately led me to continue my career journey in Australia. There, I learned to work with different cultures, challenge my status quo, and think outside the box. More recently, back in the Netherlands, I have embarked on a journey to become a certified breathwork coach as I found out that I was struggling with breathing, which affected my performance at work. I now try to help others with my findings and facilitate positive change in the lives of those around me.

Let's connect if my profile sounds of any interest to you and explore opportunities to collaborate.

name: Faithful Kumbula
location: City of Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa
headline: Executive Operational Risk & Compliance @ Old Mutual Insure | Master of Science: Accountancy& Control | Risk Management, Quality Assurance, Strategy
creator: False
school_1: GIBS Business School (Gordon Institute of Business Science)
school_2: GIBS Business School (Gordon Institute of Business Science)
bio:
As the Head of Value Proposition and Governance at Old Mutual South Africa, I work with  professionals who are responsible for ensuring that the company delivers on its promises to its customers, shareholders, and regulators. I have over three years of experience in this role, and over six years of experience in risk management and auditing within the same organization.

My core competencies include communication, bank reconciliation, quality assurance, and project management. I have a Master of Science in Accountancy and Control from the University of Amsterdam, and a Management Programme certificate from the Gordon Institute of Business Science. I am passionate about improving the performance, efficiency, and compliance of the business processes and systems that support the value proposition of Old Mutual. My goal is to contribute to the sustainable growth and development of the company and the financial services industry in South Africa.

name: Joris Tanke
headline: Financial Consultant bij Robert Muntel Financial Consultancy BV
creator: False
bio:
Robert Muntel Financial Consultancy voert Interim Finance opdrachten uit voor middelgrote en grote organisaties in Nederland. Daarnaast houden wij ons bezig met het invullen van permanente finance vacatures. Persoonlijke betrokkenheid, effectiviteit en deskundigheid zijn hierbij onze kernwaarden.

We beschikken over een deskundig en enthousiast team van ambitieuze Finance Professionals. Daarnaast beschikken we over een uitgebreid netwerk van freelance Finance Professionals (Bedrijfseconomie, Bedrijfskunde, RA, RC, post-HBO en/of MSc Controlling).

Bent u op zoek naar een Financial (interim of permanent) of bent u als Financial op zoek naar een andere baan? Ik ben u graag van dienst.

name: Mattijs Mans
headline: Partner | KPMG | Register Accountant | IFRS | ENR | International Business
creator: False
bio:
About me:
Since 2011 I have been working as an auditor for a wide variety of clients. My portfolio mainly consists of (international) companies in the field of oil and gas, retail and trading companies. As per September 2017 I have been moved to KPMG Brazil for a long term rotation. 

Returned back in 2021 and rejoined the KPMG NL firm. Since 2024 I hold the position of audit partner at KPMG NL.

Practical experience:
- Experience with US GAAP, IFRS and Dutch GAAP
- Experience with SEC regulations and SOx environment 
- Experience with statutory and group audits (both as a group auditor and component auditor)
- Experience with teaching internal and external courses


About KPMG:
KPMG provides audit, tax and advisory services. We work for a wide range of clients: major domestic and international companies, medium-sized companies, non-profit organizations and government institutions. The complicated problems faced by our clients require a multi-disciplinary approach that helps them to create order out of complexity. Our professionals excel in their own specialist fields while also working together closely to provide the added value that enables our clients to excel. In doing so, we draw from a rich source of knowledge and experience gained in diverse organizations and markets.

headline: Klantbeheerder | Accountant | kennisgroep zorg | aaff
creator: False
bio: Ik ben een ervaren accountant/adviseur met de focus op (kleinere) zorg ondernemingen en MKB. Door mijn pro-actieve houding en kennis van de regelgeving ben ik een uitstekende sparringpartner voor ondernemers. Samen met specialisten binnen Alfa en andere professionals binnen mijn netwerk kan ik de ondernemer en zijn of haar onderneming altijd voorzien van antwoord. Daarnaast stuur ik het team van klantbeheerders en assistent accountants aan op de vestiging Heerhugowaard.

name: Tjarko Tadema
headline: Care Lead | Coach
creator: False
school_2: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School
bio:
TriFinance is a network organization focused on pragmatic consultancy. With a team of over 1000
people, we are active in Belgium, Germany, the Netherlands and Luxembourg. We support our clients with advice and implementation services in the field of Finance, Human Development and IT, across industries and services.
Working at TriFinance means that your growth takes center stage. We believe that your professional
and personal development results in better solutions for our clients. We refer to this as "Furthering
people for better performance in Do-How".

name: Ilan Fernhout MSc EMFC RC
headline: CFO
creator: False
bio: I am an experienced Finance Director with a strong foundation in financial control. Combining a post-master education with a hand-on mentality, I am able to transform complex environments into transparent data which supports informed decision making. As a natural collaborator, I prioritize stakeholder interests and build strong loyal finance teams with low turnover rates. I like to be given a lot of responsibility and to be able to work on both strategic levels as well as on operational levels. name: Margaret Annan
headline: Financial Accounts Manager at Intertrust Group
creator: False
bio:
Ambitious, solution oriented accountant with a sound technical knowledge and a successful track record in all aspects of Financial Management having worked in different capacities in both private and public sector organizations. I have a drive and energy to add value to my engagements through competencies from continuous professional development with CIMA, and relevant tutoring in Financial Reporting, Performance Management & Control

I have excellent interpersonal, communication and team working skills. I introduced key initiatives in my previous role that transformed the finance and business support functions. 

Experience in:
Financial reporting (IFRS and Dutch GAAP)
Internal & External Audit
Business process review, system implementation Treasury Function
Control - Budget, forecasting, variance analysis
GL accounting, year end closedown procedure 
Multicultural business environment
Intercompany and Recharge models
Deadlines. 

Uk experience:
Excellent accounting/reconciliation skills for both P & L and Balance Sheet items. As a team manager, I have direct line management responsibilities for a team of five, including performance management, staff appraisals, objective setting, training and development. Prepared accounts in line with relevant financial standards, regulations and IFRS, US GAAP.

Have experience of working in a growing Organisations where systems, controls, procedures and accounts have to be developed from scratch and where support of Association managers are critical to ensuring compliances with generally accepted accounting practice.
I have 3 years of tutoring at the professional accounting level

name: Bas Knijf
headline: Register Controller (RC)
creator: False
bio:
Het continu verbeteren van (financiële) organisaties en processen maakt mij enthousiast. Het speelveld van bedrijven wordt steeds complexer, waardoor de casus zich meestal niet laat reduceren tot eenvoudige oplossingen. Ik maak daarom graag gebruik van alle disciplines van het controllersvak. 

Feedback waar ik het meest trots op ben, is dat ik een sterk gevoel heb voor verhoudingen binnen organisaties en wat mensen beweegt. Scenario-denker die knelpunten proactief wegneemt vóór ze problematisch worden. Denkt graag concepten uit vanaf een wit papier en begeleidt deze tot succesvolle uitvoering.

Daarnaast schrijf ik, vanuit een bedrijfseconomisch perspectief, graag over actuele thema’s op het gebied van bestuur, organisatie & (financieel) toezicht (FD/Trouw).

name: Tjeerd Renkema
headline: Chief Financial Officer ● Real Estate Investments across Europe and APAC ● RA (Dutch CA) and MSc in Accounting & Control
creator: False
bio:
A strategic financial leader and relentless problem-solver, I bring over a decade of private equity experience to fast-moving, high-pressure environments. 

I thrive where the momentum is, maximising returns and optimising resources. My ability to thrive in fast-moving and volatile markets allows me to achieve results in dynamic sectors like real estate. An RA (Dutch CA) and MSc in Accounting & Control inform and ground my approach, but it's my entrepreneurial drive, love of learning, and hands-on style that keep me energised.

Quick at comprehending how the moving parts fit together, I bring an entrepreneurial mindset to growing businesses. I design efficient, scalable systems that drive performance and long-term value. I offer board-level decision support and guide high-stakes calls—backed by data, technology, and strategic insight. 

I believe good leadership is about equipping people with the tools and then trusting them to deliver. I give teams the vision, space, and support to move fast, and whether I'm mentoring or building a high-performance team, I champion clarity, accountability, and measurable impact. 

I’m drawn to high-energy environments with complex, asset-heavy portfolios and companies with big global growth agendas. I'm known for being hugely collaborative. Comfortable in high stakes spaces, I have a strong inner drive to get things done right. 

I enjoy partnering with leaders who need to make certain that every decision enhances shareholder value and operational resilience.

A lifelong learner with a passion for data, understanding trends, and identifying emerging tech, I'm happiest when I'm curious—whether exploring market shifts or at home trying out a brand-new recipe. 
If you are as motivated to create long-term value as me, let's connect.

📧 tjeerdrenkema@gmail.com
